name: Wanypie.GitHub.io
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages.
I am Hyewon Jang (hwjang@seas.harvard.edu), post doctoral fellow for education researches in Mazur group of the Harvard university. Here is the list of my ongoing projects with co-authors and previous studies.

On-going studies

1. Identifying important STEM competencies using data of workplace
2. Educational backgrounds and pathways in solving ill-structured problems
3. Optimize the outcome of collaborative exams with automatic feedback and grading system

Previous studies

1. The linkage between cognitive skills and education
2. The return to skills in Korea:2000-2012
3. Peer instruction in science museum

### Here is my profile
http://blog.naver.com/hyewonjang/120205285141

### Here is the Korean blog that illustrates my personal thoughts about education.
http://blog.naver.com/hyewonjang

### My hobby is taking pictures of street artists near Harvard. You can see those pictures.
https://artistharvard.wordpress.com/

### Twitter
http://twitter.com/wanypie

### Interests
Educational data, Predictive analysis, Collaborative exams using automatic grading and instant feedback system, Linkage between education and required skills in labor market
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
